Mentan Gugat Majalah Tempo Rp 100 Miliar karena Berita Investigasi Gula
06 Nov 2019, 15:46 by Andi Saputra, Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Menteri Pertanian (Mentan) menggugat majalah berita mingguan (MBM) Tempo ke Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan (PN Jaksel) dengan nilai Rp 100 miliar lebih. MBM Tempo digugat karena tulisan investigasi: 'Swasembada Gula Cara Amran dan Isam'.
Berdasarkan Sistem Informasi Penelusuran Perkara (SIPP) PN Jaksel yang dikutip detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019), gugatan itu bernomor 901/Pdt.g/2019/PN.Jkt.Sel. Mentan menggugat:
1. PT Tempo Inti Media Tbk
2. Pemimpin Redaksi Majalah Tempo, Arief Zulkifli
3. Penanggung Jawab berita investigasi Majalah Tempo, Bagja Hidayat.
Dalam petitumnya, Menteri Pertanian meminta PN Jaksel menyatakan MBM Tempo telah melakukan perbuatan melawan hukum dan menjatuhkan ganti rugi materiil Rp 22 juta.
"Kerugian imateriil Rp 100 miliar," demikian petitum tuntutan Mentan.
Selain itu, Mentan meminta majalah Tempo memohon maaf yang sebesar-besarnya kepada Mentan yang harus dimuat dalam iklan/advertensi yang diterbitkan oleh surat kabar nasional dan majalah Tempo sendiri selama 7 hari berturut-turut dengan ukuran minimal 1/2 (setengah) halaman surat kabar sejak putusan ini mempunyai kekuatan hukum tetap.


Majalah

"Menghukum Para Tergugat untuk meralat dan meminta maaf kepada Penggugat (Kementerian Pertanian RI) secara tebuka di minimal 10 media cetak dan elektronik nasional mainstream atas pemberitaan Majalah Tempo Edisi 4829/9-15 September 2019 hasil liputan 'INVESTIGASI SWASEMBADA GULA CARA AMRAN DAN ISAM' dan berita-berita negatif sebelumnya (yang besarnya kolom dan penempatan ditentukan oleh Penggugat)," tuntut Menteri Pertanian.
Menanggapi gugatan ini, Arief Zulkifli membenarkan adanya gugatan tersebut. Saat ini MBM Tempo masih melakukan rapat redaksi untuk membahas gugatan tersebut.

Minister of Lawsuit Tempo Magazine Rp. 100 Billion because of Sugar Investigation News
06 Nov 2019, 15:46 by Andi Saputra, Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - The Minister of Agriculture (Mentan) is suing Tempo weekly news magazine (MBM) to the South Jakarta District Court (South Jakarta District Court) with a value of more than Rp 100 billion. Tempo MBM was sued because of the investigative writing: 'Self Sufficiency in the Amran and Isam Way of Sugar'
Based on the South Jakarta PN Case Tracking Information System (SIPP) quoted by AFP on Wednesday (11/06/2019), the lawsuit is numbered 901 / Pdt.g / 2019 / PN.Jkt.Sel. Minister of Law sues:
1. PT Tempo Inti Media Tbk
2. Editor in Chief of Tempo Magazine, Arief Zulkifli
3. Person in charge of the Tempo Magazine investigation report, Bagja Hidayat.
In his petitum, the Minister of Agriculture asked the South Jakarta District Court to declare that the Tempo MBM had committed an illegal act and handed down material compensation of Rp 22 million.
"Immaterial losses of Rp 100 billion," said the Petitum's demands.
In addition, the Minister of Agriculture asked Tempo magazine to apologize profusely to the Minister of Agriculture, which must be contained in advertisements / advertisements published by national newspapers and Tempo magazine itself for 7 consecutive days with a minimum size of 1/2 (half) newspaper pages since this decision has permanent legal force.


Magazine

"Punish the Defendants for rectification and apologize to the Plaintiffs (Ministry of Agriculture of the Republic of Indonesia) openly in at least 10 mainstream national print and electronic media for the publication of Tempo Magazine Edition 4829 / 9-15 September 2019 as a result of the coverage of 'INVESTIGATION OF SUGAR SUGAR WAY AMRANT AND ISAM' and previous negative news (the size of the column and placement determined by the Plaintiff), "demanded the Minister of Agriculture.
Responding to this lawsuit, Arief Zulkifli confirmed the existence of the lawsuit. Currently the Tempo MBM is still holding an editorial meeting to discuss the lawsuit.
